This is a fun game. At least it's fun until you get anywhere near the high ranks. 
I mainly play as the killer and it's just constant game after game of survivors who have 2k+ hours, rush the gens in 3 minutes and act like complete douchebags the entire game and taunt you in chat afterwards.
I lose multiple games in a row and my rank stays around the same place and it's just depressing to even play at times.
Just don't get decent enough at the game to enter higher ranks and you should be fine lol
